hi Prachi,

I have 2 suggestions:

a) Use Log4J framework (log4j.apache.org=
) or;

b) You can use AspectJ (which is a cleaner way to include log 
code)=
. (see www.aspectj.org or refer to the book AspectJ in 
Action, Raminvas La=
ddad).
